verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I am redeemed,
bought with a price.
Jesus has changed my whole life.
If anybody ask you just who I am,
tell them I am redeemed.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Where there was hate,
love now abounds.
Where there was strife,
peace now reigns.
I'm walking with my Saviour,
I'm a child of the King,
all because I am redeemed.
